reviewText: The whole DVD set was overpriced and the audio of all DVDs are not good.  DVD 8 specifically has no audio, you can watch the whole video but without audio.  The seller should have considered that before selling the whole set for that price.  I am not happy with this purchase.  I wish I can return them for a refund.

This is an absolutely beautiful movie. It shows a journey of the relationship between Adrian and Jennifer blossom from friendship to true love. You will be loving the story of this movie and the beautiful actors that made the characters come alive.
I recommend this movie to anyone of all ages.. it will take you on a rollercoaster ride.

i initially saw this series in youtube because i like judy ann...bought this dvd set...first half, has good plot development...latter half, kind of frustrating. anyway, it still served its purpose of exposing my family to Filipino TV shows. still good for one's dvd collection.
